Ice::
She moved in and out of consiousness.  But she did hear his comment 
on gaining weight. She'd get him for that one when she felt better. 
But she also heard him call her Wing. He hadn't called her that in 
ages.  She smiled slightly at the memory of the last time he called 
her by her other name. She tried to walk as he tried to carry her.  
She felt like she was sleep walking more than anything.  She saw the 
blurry image of a wolverine running towards her.  She was about to 
call forth an image for him, but her strength was drained far beyond 
her normal limits.  She didn't even know when she started to dream as 
she ws put into the CR. 

In the CR, she saw the battle again in her mind.  Using the power of 
the CR while asleep, she projected the image of the cage bars around 
the tank. Next to the tank, was Megaton with his skin peeling off. 
Her mental images looked very real. 

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lunarpine transformed back to his robot mode, he placed his arm 
around Ice's
> back and put her arm over his shoulder. She'd lost alot of blood 
but she was
> still slightly conscious. He opened a comm to Razor Claw, "Where 
are you you
> blasted raptor?" He put her weight on him and helped her to her 
feet, "Let
> me help you Wing." His mind was on the last time she'd taken such 
damage.
> Only difference was that this time he was there to make sure 
nothing more
> happened to her.
> 
> Razor Claw heard the transmission from his viewpoint in the 
distance. "I've
> been monitoring your situation from here, do you need assistance?" 
He asked
> starting toward the CF at a steady pace.
> 
> Lunarpine was having trouble carrying Ice, she'd put on some weight 
since
> becoming a polar bear. "Icebird took some damage, I could use a 
hand." The
> wolfbot saw everyone else enter the CF,  it was nice to see that 
they were
> still so compassionate.
> 
> In a matter of seconds the wolverine crossed the distance. he put 
on the
> breaks sliding across the dirt leaving a trail of dust and ash 
behind him.
> He quickly transformed to his "robot mode" and extended his short 
raptorlike
> arms. "Let me help" he stated putting his arms in a supportive 
position to
> help carry the polarbot.
> 
> Once inside the two bots moved Ice to a CR chamber for repairs.
>
